Having experienced the pain of slow builds firsthand across hundreds of production codebases, we're building the solution we've always wanted.
one_liner: Faster builds, zero effort.

name: Bluejay
long_description: Bluejay’s mission is to engineer trust into every AI interaction, becoming the trust layer between businesses and their customers.
one_liner: The world's first quality assurance agency for voice AI.

name: Better Auth
long_description:
Better Auth is a comprehensive authentication framework for TypeScript that lets you implement everything from simple auth flows to enterprise-grade systems directly on your own database, embedded in your backend. It’s loved by developers all over the world and endorsed by leading voices in the ecosystem.

On top of the framework, Better Auth also provides an infrastructure layer to help you scale with user management and analytics, bot and fraud detection, transactional email and SMS, global session storage and more.
one_liner: The authentication framework for TypeScript

name: Parsewise
long_description: Turn complex documents into validated information that business experts can trust and verify. Parsewise saves enterprises hours each day by automating human data tasks in analytics, benchmarking, and reporting workflows.
one_liner: Business Analytics for Unstructured Data

name: Sixtyfour
long_description: Instantly deploy custom research agents to source and enrich specialized professionals, company data, and insights directly into your existing systems.
one_liner: AI Agents for Research

name: Photonium
long_description: Photonium automates optical system design. Think of us as Cadence or Synopsys chip design automation, but for optics instead of semiconductors. We handle the full design workflow—from optimization and verification to sourcing—for industries including quantum, biomedical imaging, LiDAR for autonomous vehicles and defense, and metrology for semiconductor fabrication.
one_liner: AI-Driven Optical System Design

name: Kaizen
long_description: Kaizen leverages browser agents to enable instant integration into websites without APIs. Leading AI companies use Kaizen to read and write data from legacy portals in logistics, healthcare, and financial services.
one_liner: Integrate instantly with any website.

name: Ticket Wallet
long_description:
Ticket Wallet is an AI-powered resale platform for season ticket holders and brokers.
We automate pricing, listing, and distribution across all major marketplaces.

Today, most tickets are still sold manually: spreadsheets, guessing prices, and listing on one site at a time. The biggest brokers outsource pricing to teams in the Philippines… 

We built Ticket Wallet because we lived this. Truman has been flipping tickets for the last 5 years. Ryan built pricing software after seeing the mess first-hand. We’ve turned that pain into a product.

Since launch, we’ve onboarded $3M+ in ticket inventory, signed up 100+ paying sellers, and started working with pro teams. We charge 10% per ticket sold. This is our wedge into the $26B resale market.

Other platforms cost you money. We make you more of it.
one_liner: AI-optimized ticket resale

name: RunRL
long_description: RunRL improves LLMs and AI agents with reinforcement learning. Do you have a model that needs to get better at a certain task? Are you tired of messing around with prompts? Do you spend a lot of money on observability, and wish that all this data could let your model self-improve? Well, head on over to RunRL.com, and see what we have to offer! If you give us a model, a prompt, and a reward, we’ll make your model’s reward go up.
one_liner: Reinforcement learning as a service

name: Casco
long_description:
Casco helps companies confidently ship AI agents and apps by simulating attacks on their AI systems, identifying vulnerabilities, and providing guided remediation.

Companies building on AI face a disproportionate amount of cybersecurity threats. 73% of enterprises experienced at least one AI-related security incident in the past 12 months, with the average incident cost amounting to $4.8m. It also takes 40% longer for these companies to identify and address these breaches vs. non-AI related incidents.

Check if your AI system is secure at casco.com

---

We already secure AI systems deployed in 60% of Fortune 500 companies and are default alive. [1]

[1] http://www.paulgraham.com/aord.html
one_liner: Evaluate AI agents and apps on security, safety, and accuracy.

name: Crimson
long_description: Crimson is the first AI platform purpose-built for complex disputes. Litigation teams use Crimson to analyze case files, draft legal documents and answer case-specific questions. By automating manual workflows throughout the lifecycle of a case, Crimson helps lawyers save more than 10 hours per week on common litigation tasks.
one_liner: The AI Associate for Litigation Lawyers

name: Lucis
long_description:
Think Function Health for Europe. We combine medical expertise and AI to transform regular blood testing into actionable insights to help people live healthier, longer.
In four months in Paris, we've achieved $400K ARR, secured partnerships with France's leading lab networks, and partnered with key health influencers, proving our playbook works and scales rapidly. We are currently opening 4 new countries across Europe.
one_liner: Function Health for Europe

name: throxy
long_description:
throxy is building vertical AI agents that book meetings for companies selling into traditional industries like manufacturing, logistics, education, and finance.

Outbound is broken—generic automation gets ignored, and legacy sectors are hard to crack. throxy fixes this by running bespoke, fully-managed outbound systems for sales teams. We combine AI Agents with human experts to deliver hyper-personalised campaigns that consistently generate six-figure qualified pipelines.

Since 2023, throxy has powered outbound for B2B companies, from industrial manufacturers to fintech providers, replacing the need for internal SDR teams or heaps of tools, with a solution that outperforms in both speed and quality.

Our founding team has built AI at JP Morgan, scaled businesses from age 14, and led enterprise sales from Seed to Series D. We’re not just automating outbound, we’re redefining what sales execution looks like in traditional industries.

throxy is the AI SDR purpose-built for the sectors software forgot.
one_liner: Vertical AI agents that run the sales funnel on autopilot

name: Novoflow
long_description: Novoflow is building AI employees that automate medical operations for clinics. Novoflow built the universal bridge into EHR systems—so every workflow, from scheduling to billing, can finally run on AI. The first product is an AI employee that talks to patients and uses computer agents to book, reschedule, and recover cancelled appointments. Built for healthcare providers and hospitals.
one_liner: AI employees that automate medical operations for clinics.

name: QualGent
long_description:
QualGent is an AI Mobile App Quality Assurance Tester that mimics a real human, helping teams catch bugs and ship faster - without hiring more QA testers. One customer reached #3 in the Education category on the App Store by improving app quality with QualGent.

Mobile bugs hurt: crashes kill ratings, broken checkouts drive churn. QualGent helps teams scale QA effortlessly and avoid Sonos-level disasters.

The idea for QualGent was born from the founders’ experience leading engineering teams at Google across Android XR, Stadia, Quick Share, and foldable devices where shipping to billions of users meant constantly facing the painful trade-off between moving fast and maintaining quality. With prior research experience at Nvidia, Maryland, and Berkeley, the team saw a clear opportunity: use AI to scale QA.

QualGent’s vision is to close the loop on software creation. As AI enables engineers to code 100x faster, QualGent eliminates the next bottleneck—software verification—unlocking truly scalable, end-to-end software development.
one_liner: AI Mobile App Quality Assurance Tester

name: Third Chair
long_description:
We’re building agents for in-house legal teams, starting with media/entertainment. Our customers use Third Chair to discover IP infringements, collect evidence, and recover millions of dollars in damages.

We’re both second-time, exited YC founders with deep domain expertise in this market. My last startup sold marketing analytics to Universal Music Group and Mr. Beast. My cofounder Shourya founded a fintech platform and scaled it to 2 million users and tens of millions in transactions. 

AI will enable the first one-person unicorn. Third Chair will be their legal team.
one_liner: Agents for in-house legal teams

name: MorphoAI
long_description:
We're building an AI powered platform for engineers that are building new robots and machines. 

We allow users to invent and modify machine designs in a matter of minutes, not years. Ayna and Andy, the co-founders, met during their time at Harvard and started this in 2024 as their programs were wrapping up. We're commercializing 10+ years research done by our team at Harvard and MIT on this space. Our team wrote the very first papers on applying GenAI and optimization algorithms to compose robots from parts and applying computational design to fine tune machine designs. We're bringing in our deep knowledge of modifying equipment and integrating it into factories keenly understanding what makes hardware hard. 

We take in parts under consideration, constraints and tasks at hand and our algorithm formulates and fine tunes from 100s of possible design options. All in a few clicks, so engineers can push hardware to market faster and companies can benefit from the inventions being done by their R&D teams. We already have two paying customers in the OEM and system integrator spaces. 

We are venture backed and supported by a GBP 2.5MM grant by ARIA, the UK Government's invention agency.
one_liner: Software tool for designing robots and machines

name: Eloquent AI
long_description:
We automate complex, regulated operations in financial services—no APIs, no engineering required.
We hit $500K ARR in just four weeks because customers deploy instantly.
Our AI Operator learns by observing existing workflows and SOPs, securely controlling browser and desktop applications to automate up to 96% of tasks.
one_liner: The AI Operator for Financial Services

name: Hemut
long_description: Next-generation truck management software to automate back-office operations for trucking companies. Features include AI agents to automate inbound/outbound calls, AI document upload to reduce manual data entry, load sourcing tools, automated accounting, and more.
one_liner: AI-powered operating system for trucking companies.

name: Relixir
long_description:
Relixir is the autonomous GEO platform. We map, monitor, and continuously improve AI search rankings across ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AIO, etc.

Customers include global marketing teams from 50+ fastest growing companies like Rippling, Airwallex, Retell AI, HackerRank, etc.
one_liner: The Autonomous GEO Platform

name: Lapel
long_description:
Lapel is building a customer operations platform that brings hospitality to the internet: tools to power every touchpoint across sales, success, and support.

Today, most teams manage relationships through dashboards, funnels, and canned replies—great for metrics, terrible for humans. We believe online customer relationships should feel personal, not transactional.

Learn more at lapel.com
one_liner: Scale personalized service to every customer.

name: MindFort
long_description:
MindFort is building fully autonomous AI agents powered by their in-house models that can find, exploit, and patch complex vulnerabilities in web applications at massive scale. MindFort agents use the same principles as human penetration testers to understand their target and figure out the best ways to work together to exploit it.

While security teams were already behind with legacy tools and processes, AI coding is make the problem worse. AI generates code far faster than human teams can secure it; MindFort can match that speed and scale. Our agents will become critical as organizations scale up development with AI.
one_liner: Autonomous Security Agents

name: WorkDone Health
long_description: WorkDone Health is an AI compliance copilot for hospitals and clinics. We are like Grammarly for doctors, finding and fixing mistakes that lead to denied insurance claims or patient lawsuits. The industry today spends $40B doing this manually.
one_liner: Real-time AI Compliance for Medical Documentation

name: Propolis
long_description: Propolis simulates real users via swarms of autonomous browser agents that test for you.
one_liner: Hands off QA via intelligent browser agents.

name: Code Four
long_description:
Code Four slashes the administrative burden on law enforcement through AI-driven automation. Officers spend up to a third of their shifts manually transcribing body camera footage, creating inaccuracies, reducing transparency, and cutting into frontline duties. We're here to eliminate these inefficiencies by integrating with body cameras, record management systems, and digital evidence management systems—acting as a software layer for data processing. 

We free the most overworked and underappreciated people in the world: police officers.
one_liner: Modernizing the police workflow.

name: StarSling
long_description: StarSling is building an agentic developer homepage that automates all the tasks that eat up a developer’s time after they’ve left their code editor: deployments, performance, incidents, and bugs. Open your homepage, click on a GitHub, Linear, or Sentry issue and you’ll see an Autofix button that triggers an AI agent and opens up a Pull Request with a fix, all without leaving your homepage.
one_liner: Cursor for DevOps

name: Text.ai
long_description:
We're building the first AI agent that thinks like a group.

While everyone else is stuck with boring individual chatbots, we've cracked the impossible: AI that reads the room, understands each person, and creates custom intelligence for every group chat.

text.ai doesn't just answer questions - it lives in your conversations, silently learns what makes each friend tick, and becomes the perfect agentic AI for YOUR specific crew.

Jump in right now: Works instantly in SMS, WhatsApp, and Telegram. Zero downloads. Zero setup. Just pure ambient group genius.

🍕 "Find pizza spots we'll ALL actually like" (remembers Sarah's gluten-free, Jake's spice tolerance, everyone's budget)
🎉 "Plan something epic for Saturday" (knows the group's energy, who's free, what you actually enjoy)
🔥 "Roast my terrible movie suggestion" (adapts to your group's humor style and inside jokes)

Every group chat gets its own brain. Every friend gets understood. Every plan actually works.

The future isn't prompt → response.
It's presence → understanding → creation.

Try it now. Your friends will thank you.
one_liner: AI in your group chats

name: Cascade Space
long_description: Cascade Space is building a turn-key communications system for lunar and deep space missions. Our ground station network and integrated software tools work together to maximize uptime and availability, while reducing spacecraft iteration cycles from weeks to hours.
one_liner: Deep space communications as a service

name: DeepAware AI
long_description:
DeepAware builds an AI-driven automation system for GPU-intensive data centers. Our reinforcement-learning scheduler, real-time market integration, and unified dashboard slice energy waste by up to 30%. Coming soon: autonomous “robot-hand” inspections and maintenance to enable 24/7 operations with minimal staff.

More info: https://deepawareai.com/
Jobs/Internship: https://www.deepawareai.com/careers
one_liner: Make AI data centers more efficient.

name: CareSwift
long_description: Ambulance crews lose valuable time completing reports after each call. Even minor mistakes cause insurance claims to be rejected. CareSwift is a real-time AI assistant built directly into ambulance reporting systems, guiding medics as they document care and instantly flagging errors. Crews complete accurate, compliant reports in under three minutes, cutting documentation time by 80 percent and helping agencies avoid insurance claim denials.
one_liner: AI operating system for ambulance agencies

name: Albacore Inc.
long_description: Albacore is building 6ft-long drone submarines to deter littoral conflict. Our first product, Ghostfin can be launched from land in minutes, and carry precision effects or conduct sensing missions up to 1,000 nautical miles. Our team consists of multiple serial entrepreneurs in defense and hardware who have worked alongside top DoD leadership on autonomous platforms.
one_liner: Autonomous undersea vehicles to deter maritime invasions.

name: April
long_description: April is a voice AI Executive assistant that manages your email and calendar, hands free. It’s built for busy individuals who need EAs but don’t have them.
one_liner: Voice AI Executive Assistant

name: Pally
long_description:
Hey 👋, we’re Haz and Wyatt, the founders of Pally, and we’re building at the intersection of AI and Human Relationships. 

We believe that while AI will automate a lot of low-level tasks, that this will dramatically increase the value of human connection at the highest level.

In a world full of ‘AI SDRs’, our warm connections become more important than ever. 

Yet today, keeping track of thousands of connections across countless social platforms is impossible. We forget to respond, we miss important moments, we lose touch.  

We’re building Pally to solve that. 

We bring together every connection, across every platform. Our AI researches everything they’ve ever posted online, and uses its deep understanding of each person to help you achieve your goals; whether hiring, fundraising, or sales.
one_liner: Pally is an AI Relationship Management Platform

name: Hera
long_description:
Hera is an AI motion designer that turns 5-hour projects into 5-minute tasks. 

When you're a YouTuber making an infographic animation, instead of spending hours manually clicking buttons in Adobe After Effects, you can create the same animation in minutes in Hera. 

Through talking to our users, we realized that 95% of time spent on motion graphics is manual button clicking, not creative work. This insight led us to focus on automating the tedious parts while giving the user all creative control.

We launched in May 2025, got 100k waitlist signups in 8 weeks, and we're doubling revenue monthly.
one_liner: AI Motion Designer

name: Reacher
long_description:
Reacher is an AI-powered platform that automates creator marketing workflows—from discovery and outreach to campaign management and content strategy—making marketing teams 10x more productive. 

We handle the manual tasks so brands can focus on building relationships with creators while centralizing their operations in one platform to manage creators on TikTok Shop, Instagram, and YouTube.
one_liner: We automate creator marketing for the world's largest brands

name: Magnetic
long_description:
Magnetic scans client documents - from handwritten charity notes to excel spreadsheet Schedule Cs to multi-state K-1s - and enters them into tax software automatically, saving hours of tedious data entry. 

The accounting profession is facing a massive talent shortage, as graduates choose different professions and the old guard begins to retire. As a result, CPA and tax preparation firms are awash in clientele, but unable to keep up. At many firms, phones go unanswered, clients are "fired", and websites are taken down, as the existing workforce tries to handle the grueling 80 hour+ weeks necessary to push through tax season to the April 15th deadline.

We built this because a former colleague who owns her own tax firm asked us to automate her workload, and we quickly realized the massive opportunity. Thomas brings deep domain expertise as the former Head of Product at Keeper (YC W19), where he built tax engine automation systems and an OCR form scanning system that outperformed everything else on the market. At Keeper, he leveraged early access to OpenAI's LLMs (well before ChatGPT) to build systems that automated the entire tax filing process, allowing a tiny team of CPAs to process thousands of returns with near zero busy work. Patrick was the first engineer at FunCraft, shipping multiple mobile games with 1M+ downloads and building scalable shared codebases. We've worked together since 2017, including co-leading multiple teams at Zynga as PM & Tech Lead respectively.

We launched this year in the middle of tax season and quickly processed hundreds of returns, earning thousands in ARR, and since tax season we've been growing customers by >30% month-over-month. We've completely automated over 25% of the return process so far and developed a proprietary vision model that beats incumbent scanning technology by almost 2x on accuracy - jumping from 50% field-level accuracy to 89%, approaching the quality of their expensive human-verified service at 92%.

The opportunity is massive - there are 80M US personal tax returns filed via professionals annually, in a $2B outsourcing market where individual CPA firms currently pay $100k-$1M per year for inferior services. We're positioned to capture significant market share by offering better accuracy & document coverage, instant processing, and superior user experience.

We've built this kind of software before, we've worked together for years (and even lived together), we've built products to $10M ARR before, and we have the grit to outwork anyone in this space.
one_liner: Computer-use agents for CPA firms to automate taxes

name: Interfere
one_liner: The self-healing layer of the internet

name: NOSO LABS
long_description: In the home services industry, field technicians are expected to handle three key tasks: diagnosing issues, making sales, and completing paperwork. It's rare to find individuals who excel at all three. We build AI agents to support technicians by improving diagnostic accuracy and helping them capture sales opportunities.
one_liner: Build AI agents for field technicians to diagnose and sell 10x better

name: Veritus Agent
long_description:
Veritus is a omni-channel platform for deploying AI agents for loan servicing and collections, including inbound and outbound voice agents. Our agents negotiate repayment plans, follow up across channels, and drive recoveries with zero human involvement.

By combining cutting edge voice AI with deep regulatory compliance and vertical specialization we're able to drastically reduce the cost-to-collect while increasing recovery rates.
one_liner: AI agents for loan servicing and collections

name: burnt
long_description:
Food Supply Chain companies have been using legacy ERPs for decades. Everyone knows these are necessary evils that essentially run the business but take up a lot of operational capacity. They are not about to just rip and replace their existing system that runs their whole business with a system that takes years to implement. Imagine if they could implement AI that runs the ERP for them, in weeks?

Burnt’s building an agentic OS for the Food Supply Chain with AI Agents for each department. 

Our AI Agent, Ozai, has started by replacing the whole order management job function at food distribution companies, so that sales and customer service teams can focus on what matters - the customer. Ozai monitors all incoming messages (emails, phone calls, voicemails, whatsapp, fax etc.), figures out if it's an order, learns each customer's habits, shorthand, and favorite products, picks up on any prep notes, and enters it straight into the existing ERP. It'll even go back to the customers on your behalf when it's not sure about something, clarify things and carry on working. 

The more it sees, the smarter it gets.
one_liner: Agentic Operating System for Food Supply Chain

name: Luminal
long_description:
Luminal builds an ML framework and compiler that generates GPU code.
Our stack 10x's model speed while simplifying deployment and cutting idle GPU costs

Github: https://github.com/luminal-ai/luminal
Discord: https://discord.gg/APjuwHAbGy
one_liner: Simple ML framework and cloud for generating fast GPU code.

name: Nox Metals
long_description: Nox Metals is building the fastest metals processing factories in North America. Our software runs quoting, scheduling, and operations to streamline production and reduce cost. We supply America's industrial base with custom-cut material at unmatched speed and efficiency.
one_liner: The modern factory for fast, low-cost metals.

name: Everest
long_description:
90% SMBs rely on outsourced IT support companies to manage their IT. It's a $300B industry running on 10-20% margins. We're building AI support engineers to help them solve IT issues 20x faster and increase margins to 70-80%. 

Yolanda worked as a Senior Support Engineer at Netflix. Her team ran 3x more efficiently than average outsourced IT support companies. We're now bringing the automation Netflix has to 140K outsourced IT support companies globally.
one_liner: We build AI support engineers for outsourced IT services (MSPs)
